TestCase.name: testAggRemove_Count[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_Count[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_CountStar[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(*) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_CountStar[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(*) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_GroupKeyIsNotUnique[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, MAX(c) from MyTable1 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable1]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable1]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_GroupKeyIsNotUnique[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, MAX(c) from MyTable1 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable1]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable1]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithDistinct[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(DISTINCT b), MAX(DISTINCT b), MIN(DISTINCT c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[MAX(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$3=[MIN(DISTINCT $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b AS EXPR$1, b AS EXPR$2, c AS EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithDistinct[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(DISTINCT b), MAX(DISTINCT b), MIN(DISTINCT c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[MAX(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$3=[MIN(DISTINCT $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b AS EXPR$1, b AS EXPR$2, c AS EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithFilter[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, MIN(c) FILTER (WHERE b > 0), MAX(b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($1) FILTER $2], EXPR$2=[MAX($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], $f2=[IS TRUE(>($1, 0))], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($1) FILTER $2], EXPR$2=[MAX($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, IS TRUE(>(b, 0)) AS $f2, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithFilter[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, MIN(c) FILTER (WHERE b > 0), MAX(b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($1) FILTER $2], EXPR$2=[MAX($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], $f2=[IS TRUE(>($1, 0))], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($1) FILTER $2], EXPR$2=[MAX($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, IS TRUE(>(b, 0)) AS $f2, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutAggCall[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a, b
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutAggCall[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a, b
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutFilter1[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b + 1, c, s FROM (SELECT a, MIN(b) AS b, SUM(b) AS s, MAX(c) AS c FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a)
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[+($1, 1)], c=[$3], s=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[MIN($1)], s=[SUM($1)], c=[MAX($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, +(b, 1) AS EXPR$1, c, b AS s]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutFilter1[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b + 1, c, s FROM (SELECT a, MIN(b) AS b, SUM(b) AS s, MAX(c) AS c FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a)
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[+($1, 1)], c=[$3], s=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[MIN($1)], s=[SUM($1)], c=[MAX($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, +(b, 1) AS EXPR$1, c, b AS s]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutFilter2[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) AS s FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], s=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b AS s]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutFilter2[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) AS s FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], s=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b AS s]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy1[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAX(a), SUM(b), MIN(c) FROM MyTable2
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy1[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAX(a), SUM(b), MIN(c) FROM MyTable2
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy2[true]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAX(a), SUM(b), MIN(c) FROM (VALUES (1, 2, 3)) T(a, b, c)
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1, 2, 3 }]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[CAST(a) AS EXPR$0, CAST(b) AS EXPR$1, CAST(c) AS EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1, 2, 3 }]])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy2[false]
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAX(a), SUM(b), MIN(c) FROM (VALUES (1, 2, 3)) T(a, b, c)
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1, 2, 3 }]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[CAST(a) AS EXPR$0, CAST(b) AS EXPR$1, CAST(c) AS EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1, 2, 3 }]])
